title: Four dead after Trump supporters ransack Congress 🔴 @BBC News live - BBC
author: BBC
description:
Subscribe and 🔔 to OFFICIAL BBC YouTube 👉 https://bit.ly/2IXqEIn
Stream original BBC programmes FIRST on BBC iPlayer 👉 https://bbc.in/2J18jYJ

🔘 Subscribe and 🔔 @BBC News 👉 https://bit.ly/3a1zyip
🔘 Stream BBC News live on BBC iPlayer 🔴 https://bbc.in/3b64IVP
🔘 Coronavirus / Covid-19 👉 https://bbc.in/3luQp33
🔘 Follow BBC News live updates here 👉 https://bbc.in/2JmUswL

Top stories this morning 0:00

﻿﻿Joining our rolling coverage of the unprecedented sitiuation in the US on BBC iPlayer 👉 https://bbc.in/2J18jYJ

Here's a roundup of the latest developments:

    Lawmakers are continuing with the certification of Joe Biden's win in the November presidential election after clashes on Capitol Hill during which four people died
    Proceedings were halted when the complex was overrun by a violent group of President Trump's supporters angry at what they considered to be a rigged election
    Washington DC is under curfew and police in riot gear continue to guard the streets
    So far, at least 52 people have been arrested - 47 of them for curfew violations
    Twitter and Facebook have locked President Trump's accounts, preventing him from being able to post 

Follow the story 👉 https://bbc.in/2MIpi7V

It's Thursday 7 January 2021. Get the latest news, sport, business and weather from the BBC's Breakfast team live on iPlayer daily from 6am.

BBC Breakfast | BBC News | BBC

#BBC #BBCiPlayer #BBCNews #BBCNewsLive #BBCCoronavirus #Coronavirus #Covid-19 #CoronavirusOutbreak #Corona #CoronavirusUK

All our TV channels and S4C are available to watch live through BBC iPlayer, although some programmes may not be available to stream online due to rights. If you would like to read more on what types of programmes are available to watch live, check the 'Are all programmes that are broadcast available on BBC iPlayer?' FAQ 👉 https://bbc.in/2m8ks6v.

今早0：00的头条新闻

﻿﻿加入了我们在BBCiPlayer👉上对美国史无前例的调查的滚动报道

以下是最新事态发展的综合报道：

议员们正在继续认证乔·拜登(Joe Biden)在11月总统选举中的胜利，此前国会山发生冲突，造成4人死亡。
当特朗普总统的一群支持者对他们认为的选举被操纵感到愤怒的暴力团体占领了该建筑群时，程序暂停了
华盛顿特区实行宵禁，身穿防暴装备的警察继续守卫街道。
到目前为止，至少有52人被捕，其中47人因违反宵禁而被捕
推特和脸书已经锁定了特朗普总统的账户，阻止他发布

关注https://bbc.in/2MIpi7V👉的故事

今天是2021年1月7日星期四。从早上6点开始每天在iPlayer上直播BBC早餐团队的最新新闻、体育、商业和天气预报。

今早0：00的頭條新聞

﻿﻿加入了我們在BBCiPlayer👉上對美國史無前例的調查的滾動報道

以下是最新事態發展的綜合報道：

議員們正在繼續認證喬·拜登(Joe Biden)在11月總統選舉中的勝利，此前國會山發生衝突，造成4人死亡。
當特朗普總統的一羣支持者對他們認爲的選舉被操縱感到憤怒的暴力團體佔領了該建築羣時，程序暫停了
華盛頓特區實行宵禁，身穿防暴裝備的警察繼續守衛街道。
到目前爲止，至少有52人被捕，其中47人因違反宵禁而被捕
推特和臉書已經鎖定了特朗普總統的賬戶，阻止他發佈

關注https://bbc.in/2MIpi7V👉的故事
